TopicTitle: which planet are you most excited for?

Articles.Content: Which planet are you most excited for and why? Personally, I am most excited for Eve because the purple atmosphere just looks so awesome!
Mostly interested in gas giants and icy moons, lava planet takes second place behind all those.
Im exited for Eve as well, it will look alot cooler with a atmoshphere shader / weather effects
I'd be even more excited if one of the planets had trees or something other than booooooorrrrriiiinnnnnggggg rocks on it.
Eve and the liquid moon.

Got to be a gas giant, I want to test the crushability of my spaceships and see them implode into tiny lumps of metal. Maybe I'll even get down far enough to float, then I'd have to build for underwater ships.
Excited for all of them really.. for different reasons..

Got to be a gas giant, I want to test the crushability of my spaceships and see them implode into tiny lumps of metal. Maybe I'll even get down far enough to float, then I'd have to build for underwater ships.

Me too. I really hope they put an ocean at the bottom of all that atmosphere, and make it look metallic.

I'm looking forward to parachuting into it, and I hope they have some kind of haze that increases with depth.

I'm the only one to vote for one of the moons? Really? You guys do know that moons are the most interesting, exiting and diverse places in our real solar-system, right?

With ice-volcanoes and lava lakes and subterranean seas that could be teeming with microbial, or even complex life?
I'm most excited for the Mars-like planet because it will be the first one I go to, and it reminds me most of a real planet. Otherwise, I would go with the gas giant and moons.

I can't wait to see all of them but i have a sort of mental picture in my head..

Having landed on the moon closest to the gas giant watching the sun rise over the horizon and soon after disapearing behind a big green planet covering a big part of the night sky! Add that too the new skysphere with thousands of Stars..... SCREENSHOT! Cant wait much more!

Edited August 24, 2012 by Hyperon4

I'm the only one to vote for one of the moons? Really? You guys do know that moons are the most interesting, exiting and diverse places in our real solar-system, right?

With ice-volcanoes and lava lakes and subterranean seas that could be teeming with microbial, or even complex life?

I will fix that for you. when Base building is introduced into the game, I will make a moon base around every planet in the solar system. It would be so much easier to launch intrasolar ships from Minmus than it is from Kerbin. Also, I am looking forward to the gas giants just because of their moon systems. I am hoping that there will be moon moons too at some point... Maybe even Moon moon moons. Of course I am looking forward to new planets because its more exciting to visit moons of far away planets.
I think that flying into the gas giants would be kinda fun

I'm the only one to vote for one of the moons? Really?

It's nice to have a variety of things to like. Moons are but a part of that. I dunno, I mean it's not like you can choose more than one option in this poll.
I'm most excited for the easter egg moon that is going to appear that they haven't told us about. Because come one, you know there will be one. Even if its a 10 meter diameter asteroid.
Excited to get all the new planets of course, but I'm definitely most excited for the Mars-like planet. Can't wait to pull off Curiosity-style missions and manned return missions.
I'm excited for Gilly. That tiny thing is going to be fun to wander about.
im excited for the mars-like planet simply for a reason i cant explain
I'm excited for the gas giant because I want to see how deep I can get. Making a floating gas planet base would be boss.
I still think Kerbin is awfully pretty.

I will fix that for you. when Base building is introduced into the game, I will make a moon base around every planet in the solar system. It would be so much easier to launch intrasolar ships from Minmus than it is from Kerbin. Also, I am looking forward to the gas giants just because of their moon systems. I am hoping that there will be moon moons too at some point... Maybe even Moon moon moons. Of course I am looking forward to new planets because its more exciting to visit moons of far away planets.

So you could be a ship... Orbiting an asteroid, orbiting another asteroid... orbiting a moon that was orbiting a planet that was orbiting a star?

Yes.

Just yes.

I am most exited for Eve and the gas giants. Eve will be fun to land on and explore, and the gas giant will be the first one we have. It will also have lots of moons to explore.

So you could be a ship... Orbiting an asteroid, orbiting another asteroid... orbiting a moon that was orbiting a planet that was orbiting a star?

Yes.

Just yes.

Quoted that for my signiture.
The asteroid moon is gonna be the first thing I investigate. A potato shaped moon! How could anyone dislike something like that when all other planets are roughly spherical! Damn I'm excited!
The Mars-like planet because I want to try to land and return to Kerbin
Probably the gas giant first. I want to stick a probe in orbit around it and get Cassini-style pictures. Maybe I'll even equip the probe with a smaller probe and land it on the water moon.
